page.title: 13Shopping in Kensworth Area
page.content: Shopping in Kensworth and Whipsnade villages is carried out in two ways; from premises opening at regular hours and from motorised delivery vehicles direct to the home. In Kensworth there are two general stores selling food & licensed to sell beer,wine & spirits. One also acts as a newsagents & confectioner.There is a Sub Post Office & a Fish & Chip Shop.The latter sells hot food to take away which is cooked on the premises.In Whipsnade there is a Sub Post Office,General Store & Craft Shop selling hand made items,pictures etc.There are three delivery services covering both villages.A greengrocer calls twice a week,a fishmonger on Fridays,and the milkman makes daily deliveries of milk,bread & eggs.Supermarkets & other shops are found in local towns which are a car or bus ride away.
